title: My Portfolio
description: A modern and fully responsive personal portfolio built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion. Designed to showcase projects, skills, and experience with a clean dark theme and smooth animations.

title: Naghz-mvp
description: Naghz is a learning assistant that helps you learn essential life and soft skills through real-time, interactive guidance and this is the MVP version of the project that we are working on it.

title: 100bestmovies English learning
description: A website that helps you learn English by using a book and watching movies.

title: E-commerce
description: This project is an e-commerce website built with React. It is designed to serve as a portfolio project

title: Bagro Menu
description: A responsive menu for Bagro restaurant in Shiraz with an admin panel to add, edit and delete new items.

title: BookMarks
description: A modern, web application for managing your bookmarks with a clean, macOS-inspired design
